products.title: Faro White Vertical Blind
products.description: The faro white vertical blind featuring its modern pattern with textured streaks, the slight contrast in texture makes this blind an aesthetically pleasing choice. The crisp white colour of this blind makes it both versatile and stylish, if this sounds good to you, this blind might just be perfect for your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Lux Brilliant White Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being dimout, it will gently fileter the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Amor White Lotus Vertical Blind
products.description: Add some serenity to your home with the pure tones of the amor white lotus vertical blind. One of their best-selling roller blinds, the clean hue has a contemporary feel that pairs well with simplistic interiors. The blackout material blind is fully impenetrable to light, perfect for comprehensive shading bedrooms and overexposed areas of your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Icing Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor pure is the next shade up from the amor snowfall in terms of whiteness. In keeping with its name, the amor pure is that slightly off-white colour of paper or fluffy white cloud. All blinds in the amor range are 100% blackout so they are perfect for blocking out the light in a bedroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Amor Snowfall Vertical Blind
products.description: The amor snowfall is the whitest fabric in the amor range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Ritz Bright White Vertical Blind
products.description: This vertical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, it is great for stopping any light from passing through the fabric - great for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Lux Dark Brilliant White Vertical Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this verical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. Being blackout, the vanes will block the light entering your room when closed. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
